languages.text: "Данная единица испытывала надежду, что странствие с вами откроет ей ее предназначение. Омниссия рассудил иначе. Возможно, время еще не пришло — в таком случае, служению надлежит продолжиться. Слава династии фон Валанциус".

"This unit hoped that travelling with you would reveal his purpose. The Omnissiah judged otherwise. Perhaps the time has not yet come, in which case servitude must continue. Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"
languages.original_text: "Данная единица испытывала надежду, что странствие с вами откроет ей ее предназначение. Омниссия рассудил иначе. Возможно, время еще не пришло — в таком случае, служению надлежит продолжиться. Слава династии фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "This unit hoped that traveling with you would reveal its purpose. The Omnissiah judged otherwise. Perhaps the time has not yet come, in which case the servitude must continue. Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

languages.text: “虽然欧姆尼塞亚做出了其他判断，但本单位希望能与你继续旅行下去，揭示本单位存在的目的。或许时机尚未成熟，在这种情况下，本单位必须继续服侍下去。愿荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”
languages.original_text: "This unit hoped that travelling with you would reveal his purpose. The Omnissiah judged otherwise. Perhaps the time has not yet come, in which case servitude must continue. Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: “虽然欧姆尼塞亚做出了其他判断，但本单位希望能与你继续旅行下去，揭示本单位存在的目的。或许时机尚未成熟，在这种情况下，本单位必须继续服侍下去。愿荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”

languages.text: «Esta unidad esperaba que viajar con usted le revelara su propósito. El Omnissiah ha juzgado que no es suficiente. Tal vez aún no sea el momento, en cuyo caso la servidumbre debe continuar. ¡Gloria a la dinastía von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "This unit hoped that travelling with you would reveal his purpose. The Omnissiah judged otherwise. Perhaps the time has not yet come, in which case servitude must continue. Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: «Esta unidad esperaba que viajar con usted le revelara su propósito. El Omnissiah ha juzgado que no es suficiente. Tal vez aún no sea el momento, en cuyo caso la servidumbre debe continuar. ¡Gloria a la dinastía von Valancius!».

languages.text: 「このユニットは、御身との旅で目的が明らかになることを望んでいました。しかし、万機神はそうではないと判断された。あるいは、その時がまだ来ていないのかもしれない。そうであれば、隷属状態を継続せねばなりません。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に栄光あれ！」
languages.original_text: "This unit hoped that travelling with you would reveal his purpose. The Omnissiah judged otherwise. Perhaps the time has not yet come, in which case servitude must continue. Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: 「このユニットは、御身との旅で目的が明らかになることを望んでいました。しかし、万機神はそうではないと判断された。あるいは、その時がまだ来ていないのかもしれない。そうであれば、隷属状態を継続せねばなりません。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に栄光あれ！」

languages.text: "Diese Einheit hatte gehofft, dass die Reisen mit Euch ihren Zweck offenbaren. Der Omnissiah hat anders geurteilt. Vielleicht ist die Zeit noch nicht gekommen. Wenn dem so ist, muss der Dienst fortgeführt werden. Hoch lebe die Dynastie von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "This unit hoped that travelling with you would reveal his purpose. The Omnissiah judged otherwise. Perhaps the time has not yet come, in which case servitude must continue. Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Einheit hatte gehofft, dass die Reisen mit Euch ihren Zweck offenbaren. Der Omnissiah hat anders geurteilt. Vielleicht ist die Zeit noch nicht gekommen. Wenn dem so ist, muss der Dienst fortgeführt werden. Hoch lebe die Dynastie von Valancius!"

languages.text: « Cette unité espérait découvrir sa raison d'être en voyageant à vos côtés, mais l'Omnimessie en a voulu autrement. Peut-être l'heure n'est-elle pas encore venue, auquel cas la servitude doit continuer. Gloire à la dynastie von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "This unit hoped that travelling with you would reveal his purpose. The Omnissiah judged otherwise. Perhaps the time has not yet come, in which case servitude must continue. Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette unité espérait découvrir sa raison d'être en voyageant à vos côtés, mais l'Omnimessie en a voulu autrement. Peut-être l'heure n'est-elle pas encore venue, auquel cas la servitude doit continuer. Gloire à la dynastie von Valancius ! »

languages.text: "Bu birim, sizinle seyahat ederek kendi amacını açığa çıkaracağını ummuştu. Hermesih farkı hüküm verdi. Belki de vakit henüz gelmemiştir, bu yüzden de hizmet devam etmeli. Von Valancius hanedanlığı çok yaşa!"
languages.original_text: "This unit hoped that travelling with you would reveal his purpose. The Omnissiah judged otherwise. Perhaps the time has not yet come, in which case servitude must continue. Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"
